body:
Comment 11: 
I ran your command with no problems inside mingw shell or windows cmd.exe shell. Would
you be able to provide some sort of stack trace, so I can at least see where it is
happening. Thank you.

Do not worry about looking for EPIPE or ERROR_PIPE_NOT_CONNECTED in
/mingw/include/winerror.h, because we do not use winerror.h. Any error constants we use
are hardcoded in syscall.

Alex
